transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Sir, namaskar. Meri baat GS Panesar Mechanical Works mein ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji.
Executive: Sir, namaskar. Main IndiaMART ki team se baat kar rahi hoon, sir, recorded line se.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Aapka ek sir, hamare paas raise hua tha, jiske regarding ji se kal aapki baat hui hogi.
Customer: Madam, phir aap na dusre number pe call kar lo. Bhaiya, bhaiya se meeting hui thi. Jo 62 wala number hai na, 98.
Executive: Jo pehle wala number hai us pe.
Customer: Haan, us pe kar lo. Unse to khair baat ho hi gayi thi. Kal baat hui thi. To main bas ek reconfirmation le rahi thi ki concern resolve hua ki nahi.
Executive: Chalo, main ek baar na wahin par discuss kar leti hoon. Rest sir se baat to meri already ho hi chuki hai. Phir bhi main ek baar dobara se pooch leti hoon.
Customer: Theek hai madam, theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive called regarding a raised concern.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to call on another number.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- call, reconfirmation, concern
